meta.job_title: Manager of Sales, Cardiothoracic and PVS

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and coach a sales team to achieve sales goals in the Cardiothoracic and Professional Vacuum Systems business.
Target a variety of Surgical OR professional and medical customers, establish relationships, and drive sales of company products.
Plan and implement sales strategies, including call planning, review, and objective setting.
Develop and establish market penetration for the cardiothoracic and professional vacuum systems product lines.
Manage Key Performance Indicators and exceed sales goals through leadership and strategic customer targeting.
Provide sales service, training, and support to accounts in the assigned territory, solving problems, ensuring customer satisfaction, and providing technical advice.
Develop and deliver customer communications such as presentations, bids, and quotes as necessary and approved by corporate.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (B.S./B.A.) from a four-year college or university; minimum three to five years related experience and/or training, or equivalent combination of education and experience
